short_summary: Supply of Vehicular Power Transmission Components, Miscellaneous Electric Power and Distribution Equipment and ADP Components to the Department of National Defense
description: The government of Canada is seeking a supplier for the following items: 5x Wiring Harness, 5x Wiring Harness, Branched, 5x Computer Subassembly, 5x Computer Subassembly, 3x Parts Kit, Control Assembly, Gate Lever Shift, and 3x Parts Kit, Control Assembly, Gate Lever Shift.
full_summary:
#Government Tender Announcement
##Spare Parts Requirement
### File Number: W8486-238724/B
### Request for Proposal by the Department of National Defence
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-25 14:00:00
#### Standalone details to view and/or download tender document for purchase:  
- [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/3902414fd75fc82836755da981cb2d87/rfp_w8486-238724_b.docx1_.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/3902414fd75fc82836755da981cb2d87/rfp_w8486-238724_b.docx1_.pdf)
- [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/234a3bad79ec67773aad2912207b4b54/w8486-238724_b_enfn_amendment_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/234a3bad79ec67773aad2912207b4b54/w8486-238724_b_enfn_amendment_1.pdf)

### Description of the Requirement
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the procurement of the following items:
###### Item 1
-         Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): 2550
-         National Stock Number (NSN): 2550-20-013-2014
-         Item Description: WIRING HARNESS  
-         Quantity: 5
-         Unit of Measure: Each  
-         Delivery Address: 25CFSD Montreal  
-         Terms and Conditions to view: [RFQ Document attached in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/d761c814c4b667bd77e8bc328ad2dddb/rfp_french_w8486-238724_b.pdf) and in English
    
###### Item 2 
-        GSIN: 2551
-         NSN: 2551-20-013-2015
-         Item Description:WIRING HARNESS  
-         Quantity: 5
-         Unit of Measure: Each 
-         Delivery
